outputs.output_descr:
The project aims at facilitating the restoration of basic livelihoods in the Shida Kartli region, which has suffered heavily as a result of the recent crisis, through the rehabilitation of damaged and dilapidated infrastructures in the region.
Specific objective include rehabilitation of at least 40 damaged or under-maintained productive and social infrastructure facilities in the Shida Kartli region.

project_descr: Fostering Sustainable Transition and Early Recovery (FOSTER)
project_title: Fostering Sustainable Transition and Early Recovery
